resources.string: Located in the southwest of Antioquia to 120 km of Medellín, it has the most attractive balconies of Colombia. Its balconies are the best place to contemplate the temple built in carved stone and the main park.
Located in the framework of the main square, it has 18 rooms: 10 rooms with balcony and 8 internal. Restaurant service, wet area, internet, game room and reading.
It offers accommodation services, especially to family groups, with peaceful and quiet spaces for rest and encounter with our Antioqueño customs.
It is a means of transport and of load for the peasants and also one of the attractive tourist of the municipality. The cost round trip for tourists has a value of 5,000 Colombian pesos.

The cave of splendor has become one of the most important tourist attractions of the municipality of jardin Antioquia, is a wonderful place, imposing and full of majesty and splendor, as well as an attraction for people interested in extreme sports.

Another of the wonderful adventures that can be enjoyed in Jardin is to take a tour of its already renowned coffee plantations and witness firsthand the whole process that involves the elaboration of this Antioqueño coffee, emblem of the municipality and the department.
A pleasant place to enjoy a good seasoning and the best of services.
"The sweets of the garden that enchant until the same pope, It takes the first place of the most visited tourist sites in Garden."

The valdivia restaurant aside from its exquisite seasoning, has ample spaces for the enjoyment of the whole family and to get in touch with the autochthonous traditions of this small corner of the sky in Antioquia.
